attributes.action: Ensure all UK pensions are autoutomatically enrolled into ethical funds.
attributes.additional_details: Most people would be horrified to learn that their hard earned money was being spent simply to generate a fast buck, when it means the destruction of people, wildlife and the planet. This has no place in a modern progressive society and our pension investments should automatically reflect that in line with; Our COP24 obligations, the drive to improve public health & wellbeing, to help everyone to feel safe from the threat of war and to save money in the long term.
attributes.background: Stop pension providers from investing our money into unethical programmes that have no place in a modern and progressive society. From weaponry and tobacco production to fossil fuel development and exploration.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on investments by pension funds are a matter for those funds. Private pension holders can choose from a range of funds, including those which don't invest in specific types of business.

You could start a petition calling for pension holders to be entitled to opt-in to 'ethical' funds, but you would need to be clear what was covered by that.
